answers.answer: I don't think it's exactly the week your at, no, google fundal height measurements, and you'll find all sorts of info on it!
Its cm and its measureing the cervix and yes if your 31 weeks you should be measuring at 31 cm.that's what my ob told me my first pregnancy
i believe so yes but there so inacurate! at 28 i measured 31 but when i went the next day i was back to 28. extra fluid, bloating can throw of results so dont worry about that.

thank u. im coming up to 31 weeks only few more days and im measuring 36cms it shouldnt be out by that much should it. i did have my GT test on wednesday but i dont have my results yet but this could be y coz if i do have gestational diabetes it makes babys really big dont it. x

GD does have larger babies usually, but like the above poster said, it can be off by MANY things, mine was always over 2-3cm's, and my doctor told me it's not abnormal, it's just a range. My son was born right on his due date, 8lbs 9.5ozs! They could have gotten your due date wrong as well, or you might have more fluid!

question: im totally confused i have been trying to look on the internet but its not tellin me what i want to know. at 31 weeks should i be measuring 31cms. my uterus with a tape measure. should u measure how many weeks u r in cms like for example if i was 34 weeks should i be measuring 34cms or 27wks 27cms. i hope this makes sence lol x
